question: How does the People’s Postcode Lottery Refer A Friend scheme work?
answer: The Refer A Friend scheme is open to existing People's Postcode Lottery players. Players can refer friends to sign up and play for the first time and receive a reward when their friends successfully join. To be eligible for rewards, players must register for the Refer A Friend scheme before referring friends. More information is available on the main Refer A Friend page.

question: How can I introduce my friends using the Refer A Friend scheme?
answer: Once registered for the Refer A Friend scheme, you can introduce friends by telling them in person, sharing the offer by email, on Facebook, or via other messaging platforms. Your friends must use your referral link, click "Been referred?" during sign up, and enter your full name. If more than one player has the same name, they may also be asked for your registered email address.

question: What rewards are available with the People’s Postcode Lottery Refer A Friend scheme?
answer: When you successfully refer friends who sign up and play for the first time, both you and your friends can choose from a range of gift cards. Current options include Tesco, M&S, John Lewis, Boots, Odeon, Deliveroo and others. The rewards available may change over time.

question: I’m not a player of People's Postcode Lottery. Can I refer friends to sign up?
answer: No. The Refer A Friend scheme is only available to current People's Postcode Lottery players. You must be a player to make referrals. Once you sign up and start playing, you will be invited to join the Refer A Friend scheme.

question: I’m waiting on my Refer A Friend reward. When will it be available?
answer: Refer A Friend rewards only become available after the new player has successfully played in their first draw. This may take several weeks after they sign up, so there may be a short delay before the reward is issued.

question: How will I know when my reward from People's Postcode Lottery can be claimed?
answer: You will be contacted by email when your Refer A Friend reward is ready to be claimed.

question: Is there a limit on how many people I can refer in the Refer A Friend scheme?
answer: Players can refer as many friends as they like. However, only the first five successful referrals will earn a reward. Any further referrals will not be rewarded.

question: Who is Mention Me?
answer: Mention Me is a leading customer advocacy platform that helps generate referrals. People's Postcode Lottery has partnered with Mention Me to deliver its Refer A Friend scheme.

question: Who is Runa?
answer: Runa is a provider of digital rewards and incentives. They will fulfil gift card rewards for the Refer A Friend scheme for rewards earned up to 30 November 2025, and pay to enter the December draws.

question: Who is Black Hawk Network?
answer: Black Hawk Network is a provider of digital rewards and incentives. They will fulfil gift card rewards for the Refer A Friend scheme from 1 December 2025 onwards.

question: Does my gift card expire with the People's Postcode Lottery Refer A Friend scheme?
answer: Rewards earned up to 30 November 2025 have a claim link valid for 90 days. Rewards earned from 1 December 2025 have a claim link valid for at least 60 days. Once claimed, the Gift Card is valid according to the selected retailer's Terms and Conditions.

question: How do I share Refer A Friend with my friends and family?
answer: You can share the offer via word of mouth, email, Facebook, or by copying the referral link. Friends must click 'Been referred?' during sign up and enter your name (or email if needed). Rewards are given after your friend successfully plays in their first draw. Draws occur near the start of each month, so it may take a few weeks for rewards to be confirmed. A maximum of five rewards can be claimed per year.

question: How do I share the Refer A Friend link on Facebook?
answer: After registering for the Refer A Friend scheme on our website, you can share the offer via Facebook. Clicking the Facebook option allows you to post on your News Feed or Your Story with a link inviting friends to join. Ensure you have 'Apps, games and websites' integration turned on in your Facebook settings: go to Settings & Privacy → Settings → Apps and Websites → Turn On under 'Apps, websites and games'.

question: I haven’t received my Refer A Friend gift card. What should I do?
answer: There are several reasons you might not have received your gift card. It could be that your referred friend has not yet been entered into a draw. You can manage your referrals using your Mention Me sharing dashboard, accessed through your Refer A Friend scheme emails. You will also be notified by email of successful or unsuccessful referrals.
